
### network
 
 - Virtual Machine 
    - Settings > Network > Attached to: Bridge Adapter
    - Run > login
    - cd /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts
    - vi ifc-enp0s3 
      - check, change or add following lines:
        BOOTPROTO=none
        ONBOOT=yes 
        IPADDR=192.168.x.yyy
        NETMASK=255.255.255.0
        GATEWAY=192.168.x.1
        DNS1=8.8.8.8
        DNS2=8.8.4.4
    - restart the network interfaces: service network restart
    - test: ping 8.8.8.8
